q: Do something to move yourself toward your major goal every day.
h:
“Do something to move yourself toward your major goal every day.” —
Brian Tracy

q: He who possesses most must be most afraid of loss.
h:
“He who possesses most must be most afraid of loss.” —
Leonardo da Vinci

q: Life has more imagination than we carry in our dreams.
h:
“Life has more imagination than we carry in our dreams.” —
Christopher Columbus

q: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
h:
“Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.” —
Amelia Earhart

q: You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
h:
“You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.” —
Les Brown

q: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
h:
“When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.” —
Bhagavad Gita

q: Do not bite at the bait of pleasure, till you know there is no hook beneath it.
h:
“Do not bite at the bait of pleasure, till you know there is no hook beneath it.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: Giving is the secret of a healthy life. Not necessarily money, but whatever a person has of encouragement, sympathy and understanding.
h:
“Giving is the secret of a healthy life. Not necessarily money, but whatever a person has of encouragement, sympathy and understanding.” —
John D. Rockefeller

q: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
h:
“There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.” —
Beverly Sills

q: Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.
h:
“Always do what is right. It will gratify half of mankind and astound the other.” —
Mark Twain

q: People who have goals succeed because they know where they're going. It's that simple.
h:
“People who have goals succeed because they know where they're going. It's that simple.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: Experience is a comb which nature gives us when we are bald.
h:
“Experience is a comb which nature gives us when we are bald. ” —
Chinese Proverb

q: Each of us is a unique strand in the intricate web of life and here to make a contribution.
h:
“Each of us is a unique strand in the intricate web of life and here to make a contribution.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: Be where your enemy is not.
h:
“Be where your enemy is not.” —
Sun Tzu

q: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
h:
“Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.” —
Henry Ford

q: I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.
h:
“I discovered a long time ago that if I helped enough people get what they wanted, I would always get what I wanted and I would never have to worry.” —
Tony Robbins

q: It's what you do in the present that will redeem the past and thereby change the future.
h:
“It's what you do in the present that will redeem the past and thereby change the future.” —
Paulo Coelho

q: The scariest moment is always just before you start. After that, things can only get better.
h:
“The scariest moment is always just before you start. After that, things can only get better.” —
Stephen King

q: The key to success is failure.
h:
“The key to success is failure.” —
Michael Jordan

q: We must not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we began and to know the place for the first time.
h:
“We must not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we began and to know the place for the first time.” —
T.S. Eliot

q: Go and do the things you can't. That is how you get to do them.
h:
“Go and do the things you can't. That is how you get to do them.” —
Pablo Picasso

q: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
h:
“Believe you can and you're halfway there.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

q: A Quitter never wins - and - a Winner never quits.
h:
“A Quitter never wins - and - a Winner never quits.” —
Napoleon Hill

q: Be truthful about your emotions, and use your mind and emotions in your favor, not against yourself.
h:
“Be truthful about your emotions, and use your mind and emotions in your favor, not against yourself.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: Don't look for meaning in the words. Listen to the silences.
h:
“Don't look for meaning in the words. Listen to the silences.” —
Samuel Beckett

q: The time is always right to do what is right.
h:
“The time is always right to do what is right.” —
Martin Luther King, Jr.

q: Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.
h:
“Instead of being intimidated by the limitations, be inspired to find new ways around them.” —
Ralph Marston

q: Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
h:
“Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher. ” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: Everyday you can take a tiny step in the right direction.
h:
“Everyday you can take a tiny step in the right direction.” —
Unknown

q: It is better to disappoint people with the truth than to appease them with a lie.
h:
“It is better to disappoint people with the truth than to appease them with a lie.” —
Simon Sinek

q: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
h:
“There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.” —
Colin Powell

q: When you know what you want, and you want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.
h:
“When you know what you want, and you want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.” —
Jim Rohn

q: Thinking is the hardest work there is. That is why so few people engage in it.
h:
“Thinking is the hardest work there is. That is why so few people engage in it.” —
Robert Kiyosaki

q: You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.
h:
“You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes.” —
A.A. Milne

q: Where there's life, there's hope.
h:
“Where there's life, there's hope.” —
Stephen Hawking

q: Don't let them drag you down by rumors. Just go with what you believe in.
h:
“Don't let them drag you down by rumors. Just go with what you believe in.” —
Michael Jordan

q: Where there is anger, there is always pain underneath.
h:
“Where there is anger, there is always pain underneath.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: Don't stumble over something that's behind you.
h:
“Don't stumble over something that's behind you.” —
Steve Harvey

q: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
h:
“Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.” —
Mother Teresa

q: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
h:
“Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
h:
“Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Through selfless service, you will always be fruitful and find the fulfillment of your desires.
h:
“Through selfless service, you will always be fruitful and find the fulfillment of your desires.” —
Bhagavad Gita

q: Before you speak, ask yourself, is it kind, is it necessary, is it true, does it improve the silence?
h:
“Before you speak, ask yourself, is it kind, is it necessary, is it true, does it improve the silence?” —
Sathya Sai Baba

q: A path is made by walking on it.
h:
“A path is made by walking on it.” —
Zhuangzi

q: Change is never easy, but always possible.
h:
“Change is never easy, but always possible.” —
Barack Obama

q: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
h:
“The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering. ” —
Bruce Lee

q: Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often.
h:
“Those who are easily shocked should be shocked more often.” —
Mae West

q: The more you take responsibility for your past and present, the more you are able to create the future you seek.
h:
“The more you take responsibility for your past and present, the more you are able to create the future you seek.” —
Celestine Chua

q: It all depends on what you choose to believe.
h:
“It all depends on what you choose to believe.” —
Spencer Johnson

q: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
h:
“Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.” —
Alexander Pope
